name: Garby
description:
It's Garbin' time!

Billionaire polluters are wrecking the planet! This is a job for Garby the Garbage Can!

Guide Garby through colorful worlds as you run and jump collecting all the trash you see. Learn about the affects of e-waste, oil spills, and space debris on our ecosystem. Take on big corporate polluters in exciting boss battles.

Fun platforming adventure for all ages!

Play again and again to try for the top score and find each world's hidden secrets.

Remember kids- pollution is no game. Polluters never win! 

Stay in school and don't do drugs!

Garby!
